avocados.name: Hass
avocados.description: The Hass avocado is a popular variety known for its creamy texture and rich flavor. It is one of the most widely cultivated and consumed avocados globally.

avocados.name: Fuerte
avocados.description: The Fuerte avocado is a distinctive variety known for its smooth, creamy texture and nutty flavor. It offers a unique taste experience for avocado enthusiasts.

avocados.name: Zutano
avocados.description: The Zutano avocado is a unique variety known for its pear-like shape and mild flavor. It is often praised for its versatility in various culinary applications.
